      • resizeImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage resizeImage(java.awt.Image image,
                                                       int newWidth,
                                                       int newHeight)
        Function which changes size of an BufferedImage. Creates a new scaled Image and converts it to a bufferedImage and returns it.
        Parameters:
        image - - The image to scale
        newWidth - - The new width
        newHeight - - The new height
        Returns:
        A BufferedImage object with the new re scaled BufferedImage.

        Converts a given Image into a BufferedImage.
        Parameters:
        img - - The Image to be converted
        Returns:
        The converted BufferedImage

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A String with the name of the object.
